name: Charmander
description: Charmander (ヒトカゲ Hitokage) is a Fire-type Pokémon. It evolves into a Charmeleon.

name: Charmeleon
description: Charmeleon (リザード Rizaado) is a Fire-type Pokémon. It evolves into a Charizard.

name: Charizard
description: Charizard (リザードン Rizaadon) is a Fire/Flying-type Pokémon.
